title: Romantic British Escape in Historic Bath
description: Discover the architectural treasures, Roman baths and impeccable heritage of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Bath, a British gem located in the heart of Somerset, reachable in less than two hours from London. Experience a boutique escape in the heart of it all at The Roseate Villa, a charming hotel consisting of two, beautifully restored Victorian houses where you will enjoy daily breakfast, a traditional cream tea, and a welcome drink on arrival.
offer_address: Henrietta Road, Bath BA2 6LX, United Kingdom

title: Five-Star Boutique Break in Historic Bath
description: Experience a boutique escape at The Roseate Villa Bath, a charming hotel consisting of two beautifully restored Victorian houses. Originally built for pleasure and relaxation, beautiful Bath and its natural waters have been a popular wellbeing destination since Roman times. Located in the heart of Somerset, less than two hours' drive from London, Bath lets you immerse yourself in the ancient bathhouses that inspired the city's name, before discovering architectural treasures and embracing its remarkable heritage. Your escape includes daily breakfast, a traditional cream tea and a welcome drink on arrival.
offer_address: Henrietta Road, Bath BA2 6LX, United Kingdom

title: Boutique UK Hideaway in the Heart of Heritage Bath with Afternoon Tea & Daily Breakfast
description:
Step through the sandstone facade to discover charming The Bird, Bath, a historic getaway nestled in the verdant surrounds of the UK's only UNESCO World Heritage-listed city. Richly furnished with bespoke textiles, local artwork, plush velvet furniture and quirky decor pieces, this darling hotel will capture your attention and heart. Curl up with a good book in the plush communal lounge, indulge in a glorious afternoon tea of scones, pastries and sparkling wine, or try out PLATE restaurant’s exciting seasonal menu of locally sourced ingredients.

A meander from the town's historic main attractions, from the Jane Austen Centre (the city's most famous former resident) to lively The Recreation Ground and Twerton Park stadiums, the hotel provides an intimate and idyllic retreat between adventures. Visitors to Bath have been delighting in the area's warm, mineral-rich hot springs for more than 2,000 years - follow in their footsteps with an afternoon of extravagance at one of the city's numerous day spas, such as the nearby Thermae Bath Spa.
offer_address: 18-19 Pulteney Road South, Bathwick, Bath BA2 4EZ, United Kingdom

title: Five-Star Elegant Bath Spa Escape with Underground Romanesque Spa
description: Lose yourself in bliss and tranquility with an escape to Gainsborough Bath Spa, stepping into the original thermal springs, built within a magnificent Gregorian playground. Occupying two buildings in the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage site, this five-star abode offers rejuvenating spa sessions at Spa Village Bath and tipples to tickle your tastebuds at the Gainsborough Bar. Should you wish to travel further afield, it's also perfectly located to explore the picturesque Cotswolds region.
offer_address: Beau Street, Bath BA1 1QY, United Kingdom

title: Quaint Bath Stay with Spa and Outdoor Heated Pool
description: Escape to rolling green hills on a magnificent countryside stay at the quaint and welcoming Homewood. Step inside the hotel’s historic stone walls and be swept away by opulent interiors filled with vibrant art and lavish furniture. If rejuvenation is in order, a visit to the hotel’s luxurious spa is the perfect way to enhance your escape. When hunger bites, sample succulent Mediterranean dishes on the terrace, or indulge under the stars in a futuristic dining dome.
offer_address: Abbey Lane, Freshford, Bath, Somerset BA2 7TB, United Kingdom

title: Five-Star Boutique Break in Historic Bath overlooking Henrietta Park
description:
Experience a boutique, five-star escape at The Roseate Villa, Bath, a quintessential British stay consisting of two beautifully restored Victorian houses in the heart of a historic location. Expect elegant touches such as faux-bookcase wallpaper, bespoke wooden furniture that triggers memories of days gone by and a meticulously landscaped garden that's the perfect setting for a twilight stroll. Indulge in a classic English afternoon tea complete with scones and prosecco, or sip a lavish cocktail mixed by an expert at Henrietta Bar. There’s also a resident dog - Border Terrier Muttley - who will surely make your stay even more unique.

Ideally located in a quiet corner of Bath, a moment's walk from the heart of the city centre, The Roseate Villa, Bath, overlooks the perfectly manicured gardens of Henrietta Park - a historic seven-acre park built in celebration of Queen Victoria's Diamond Jubilee in 1897. Stamped with a 2021 Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Award and ranked in the top three hotels in Bath, this stunning hotel delivers immaculate hospitality and luxury amenities within a short walk of the Jane Austen Museum and the grandeur of Bath Abbey.
offer_address: Henrietta Road, Bath BA2 6LX, United Kingdom

title: Modern Bath Stay within Historic Georgian Terrace
description: Experience an elegant heritage escape at Hotel Indigo Bath, an IHG Hotel, a charming hotel set within a beautifully restored Georgian Terrace. Explore this gorgeous area and immerse yourself in the ancient bathhouses that inspired the city's name, before discovering architectural treasures including the Bath Abbey, Roman Baths and Pulteney Bridge. At the hotel, savour delicious fare at The Elder Restaurant or release some endorphins at the stylish gym locate onsite.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Bath, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 2-8 South Parade, Bath, BA2 4AB United Kingdom

title: Five-Star Boutique Bath Opulence within Award-Winning Spa & Bathhouse
description: Walk through the doors of The Royal Crescent Hotel & Spa and be swept into a world of iconic luxury within the heart of Bath, renowned for its Roman-built baths and UNESCO-listed Georgian architecture. Standing regal and proud for more than 250 years, this five-star, landmark retreat will make you feel effortlessly royal with an award-winning spa and bathhouse surrounded by more than an acre of glorious gardens. Swoon over the period portraiture, look out from tall windows that face the city or back over private gardens, home to Montagu's Mews Restaurant & Bar. Then, elevate your stay with afternoon tea outside (if weather permits) in a sun lounger.
offer_address: 16 Royal Crescent, Bath, BA1 2LS United Kingdom

title: Eclectic Boutique UK Escape in the Heart of Heritage-Rich Bath
description: Fabulous style and endless charisma are at the forefront of The Bird, Bath hotel, tucked away in the grassy surrounds of the UK's only UNESCO World Heritage-listed city. This vibrant hotel is a stone's throw from iconic Bath Abbey and the romantic city centre, famed for its ancient architecture and Roman relics. But with onsite dining options including decadent afternoon tea and a glass of champagne on the terrace, you may not find reason to leave.
offer_address: 18-19 Pulteney Road, Bath BA2 4EZ, United Kingdom
